description: I. Letter dated 19/06/2008 from Alistair Darling MP to John McFall MP regarding the appointment of the deputy governor of the Bank of England for Monetary Stability, and enhancing the role of the Bank of England in preserving financial stability 10 p. II. Press notice dated 19/06/2008 regarding the appointment of the deputy governor of the Bank of England for Monetary Stability, and enhancing the role of the Bank of England in preserving financial stability. 4 p.
